page_content: The page discusses traffic disruptions in the city of Bern due to a traditional event, Fasnacht.
The page provides information on how foreign pensions and benefits are taxed in Switzerland.
The page discusses the Tour de Romandie 2012 cycling event and its impact on traffic in the Bern region.
The page provides information on lump-sum deductions for disability-related expenses in Switzerland.
The page provides information on how pensions from the AHV compensation fund and disability insurance are taxed in Switzerland.
